digitalnet.implementation



alias LinearScramble = std.typecons.Tuple!(uint[], uint).Tuple;


template DigitalNetFunctions(U, Size)


struct DigitalNet(U = uint, Size = GreaterInteger!U) if (isUnsigned!U);
A digital net.

const ShiftedDigitalNet!(U, Size) opBinary(string op)(in U[] shift) if (op == "+");
Apply a digital shift.

const DigitalNet!(U, Size) opBinary(string op)(in LinearScramble linearScramble) if (op == "*");
Apply a linear scramble.

struct ShiftedDigitalNet(U = uint, Size = GreaterInteger!U) if (isUnsigned!U);
A digitally shifted digital net.

const ShiftedDigitalNet!(U, Size) opBinary(string op)(in U[] shift) if (op == "+");
Apply a digital shift.

const DigitalNet!(U, Size) removeShift();
Remove a digital shift.

const ShiftedDigitalNet!(U, Size) opBinary(string op)(in LinearScramble linearScramble) if (op == "*");
Apply a linear scramble.

DigitalNet!U toDigitalNet(U = uint)(const(char)[] x);
Read a digital net from a string.

ShiftedDigitalNet!U toShiftedDigitalNet(U = uint)(const(char)[] x);
Read a digitally shifted digital net from a string.

template GreaterInteger(U) if (isUnsigned!U)


alias Precision = std.typecons.Typedef!(uint, 0u, "prec").Typedef;


alias DimensionR = std.typecons.Typedef!(uint, 0u, "dimR").Typedef;


alias DimensionF2 = std.typecons.Typedef!(uint, 0u, "dimB").Typedef;


DigitalNet!U randomDigitalNet(U = uint)(Precision precision, DimensionR dimensionR, DimensionF2 dimensionF2) if (isUnsigned!U);
Construct a digital net by uniform random choice of its basis.

auto randomDigitalShift(S)(S P) if (is(S == DigitalNet!(U, Size), U, Size) || is(S == ShiftedDigitalNet!(U, Size), U, Size));
U[] randomDigitalShift(U)(Precision precision, DimensionR dimensionR) if (isUnsigned!U);
Uniformly and randomly pick a digital shift.

auto randomLinearScramble(S)(S P) if (is(S == DigitalNet!(U, Size), U, Size) || is(S == ShiftedDigitalNet!(U, Size), U, Size));
Uniformly and randomly pick a linear scramble.

DigitalNet!(U, Size) shuffle(U, Size)(DigitalNet!(U, Size) P);
Shuffle the basis of a digital net.

void partialShuffleBasis(U)(U[][] basis);
Partially shuffle a sequence of vectors.

void shuffleBasis(U)(U[][] basis);
Shuffle a sequence of vectors.

DigitalNet!(U, Size) changeVectorOfBasis(U, Size)(DigitalNet!(U, Size) P);
Obtain another digital net Q from a digital net P where dim P = 1 + dim(P cap Q) = dim Q.
